job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
100% remote, Contract to Hire, W2 only
The #1 online wine retail store desires passionate Site Reliability Engineers who are fascinated with improving the customer experience by helping them discover great wines from all over the world.
Envisioned yourself yourself joining the team? Cheers, innovators!
Top Skills' Details
AWS Cloud – setting up cloud formations, security groups, cloud watch metrics
Terraform & Kubernetes
Automation/CM with Ansible and Chef-Python Coding required
Responsibilities will include, but not be limited to:
Development of new applications and tools to automate key portions of our production infrastructure
Development of solutions for the automation of system provisioning and deployment
Research and implementation of new monitoring systems
Develop and deploy new tools for the automation of configuration management processes
Build internal tools for centralized infrastructure management
